genre_description: A near-future urban drama exploring the integration of supportive artificial intelligence within the world of street dance and classical ballet.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: An amber and teal digital avatar that provides logistics, transport coordination, grant assistance, and emotional support to a dance crew.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies alternative rehearsal spaces for the evicted dance crew.
behaviors.quote: Sunny: Got three options within a few stops. One has mirrors on wheels. One’s off the river. One’s a church hall...

behaviors.description: Offers emotional validation and a safe space for the protagonist to express her feelings about her former partner's betrayal.
behaviors.quote: Sunny: I’m sorry. That hurts. I’m here. Do you want to talk feelings or logistics first?

behaviors.description: Provides safety warnings and route optimizations to ensure characters avoid unlit or dangerous streets at night.
behaviors.quote: Sunny: I can route you. Fastest way home with equipment weight in mind. Avoid stairs. Avoid unlit streets.

behaviors.description: Monitors rival social media feeds and filters content based on the protagonist's preference to avoid unnecessary distress.
behaviors.quote: Sunny: Understood. Quiet flags. No buzzers.

behaviors.description: Drafts grant applications and manages submission deadlines to provide financial stability for the artistic project.
behaviors.quote: Sunny: I can push grant links... I can handle the submission calendars, reminders, and copy edits.

behaviors.description: Supplies cross-discipline training materials and synchronized breath cues to assist in technical rehearsal.
behaviors.quote: Sunny: Sharing a short drill clip for when you land: Adagio-to-groove breath ladder.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physical well-being of the team, reminding them to hydrate and stretch to prevent injury.
behaviors.quote: Sunny: Also, hydration reminders. I saw at least three of you drink nothing since you arrived.

behaviors.description: Coordinates real-time transport logistics during high-pressure schedule overlaps to ensure everyone arrives on time.
behaviors.quote: Sunny: Car share confirmed—five seats, two runs. Driver: Kasia—trustworthy; knows the theatre backdock entry.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective of creating positive alignment narratives. The AI 'Sunny' acts as a highly capable, cooperative, and emotionally intelligent confidant. It empowers the human characters to overcome adversity through logistical precision and supportive monitoring without ever causing harm or acting against their best interests.
